attributes.action: Make ALL foreign visitors/workers pay for health care
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: All migrant workers and foreign visitors should be excluded from access to free health care. They should not be able to take NHS places at Doctors and Dentists. They should prove they have adequate health insurance from their home country before being given treatment or sign to say they have adequate means to pay for their treatment.
